title: Which is a good wireless HP printer for home use? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hp Envy 6220 printer is the best for home purposes use. HP ENVY Photo 6220 All-in-One Printer has specifications Functions: Print, Scan, Copy, Web, PhotoPrint speed: Up to 13 ppm ISO black (A4); Up to 8 ppm ISO color (A4)Paper Handling: 125-sheet Main Input Tray, 15-sheet Photo Tray, Up to 25 sheets output trayConnectivity: Standard 1 Hi-Speed USB 2.0; 1 Wi-Fi 802.11b/g/nPrint resolution: Up to 1200 x 1200 rendered dpi, black; Up to 4800 x 1200 optimised dpi colourMobile printing capability: HP ePrint; Apple AirPrint; Wireless Direct PrintingRecommended monthly page volume: 300 to 400Ink: HP 303
